name: Stella (COBRRYSE)
description:
Summary

Stella is an old school, intergalactic shoot-em-up, inspired by arcade classics of yesteryear. Stella features gameplay, graphics, UI design, music, and sound effects reminiscent of its arcade cabinet ancestors. So whether you want a blast from gaming past or you want to save the universe, Stella is the game for you.

Features

Stella currently features:
  • 8-Bit graphics, accurate to the arcade era
  • Chiptune music and sound effects
  • Endless waves of enemies, with difficulty increasing every few waves
  • Powerups
  • 1 Player and 2 Player Co-op modes
  • And many more...
